name: Craft Prison Escape 3D
description:
Welcome to new survival game - Craft Prison Escape 3D! You must find a key in rooms and then run to the exit. Beware of predators! They can attack you from around the next corner!
Run throw numerous labyrinths. Explore secrets rooms and you will be able to find many items, such as food or fresh water, weapons - diamond pick and metal axe. These items will help you get to the exit alive.

Features:
• Survival game!
• Blocky maze!
• Different level biomes!
• Pixelated 3d graphics!
• New room escape game!

Start your amazing adventure now!
